bill.title: Mississippi Health Information Network; establish and empower board of directors.
bill.description: An Act To Establish The Mississippi Health Information Network Exchange(m-hin) To Promote The Use Of Health Information Technology And Exchange Of Information To Improve Health Care Quality And Efficiency; To Prescribe The Membership Of The Board Of Directors Of The M-hin And Its Organization; To Empower The Board To Employ An Executive Director, Prescribe Powers And Duties And Adopt Rules And Regulations To Implement The Purpose Of The M-hin; To Provide For Limitation Of Liability Of The Board And The M-hin; To Provide For Property Rights Of Information And Data To The M-hin; To Provide For Confidentiality; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare
